title: Welcome
text:
Alin Sever – Data Analyst & MSc in Applied Data Science
Welcome to my professional portfolio.
This website showcases selected analytical, machine learning, and data science projects developed during my MSc at the Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and through independent work.
The portfolio is divided into two main sections:

ML Portfolio — machine learning work in R and Python

Standalone Projects — applied analysis, dashboards, data pipelines, and research projects

Use the sidebar to navigate through the content.

title: Machine Learning Portfolio
text:
This section presents machine learning work developed in R and Python.
Projects included:

R Labs (example: SVM on iris)
NHANES health analysis in R (regression + SVM)
Diabetes readmission prediction in Python (end-to-end pipeline)

More projects will be added as the MSc program continues.

title: NHANES Project (R)
text:
This section will host the NHANES health analysis project, including regression models, classification, and data exploration.
Content will be added soon.

title: Standalone Projects
text:
This section includes analytical projects that are not strictly machine learning models but still demonstrate data science and applied research skills.
Current projects:

Bitcoin & Portfolio Analysis (R)
Swiss Energy Production and Solar Radiation (R)
